com.tapsterrock.mpp
Class MPPFile

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXFile
        |
        +--com.tapsterrock.mpp.MPPFile
public class MPPFile
extends MPXFile

This class is used to represent a Microsoft Project MPP file. This implementation allows the file to be read, and the data it contains exported as a set of MPX objects. These objects can be interrogated to retrieve any required data, or stored as an MPX file.
